comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Coal Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Whitby,

We'd be happy to include this photo in the Coal Art group.  Thanks for asking!

- Jill
U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 31541951@N07
comment._content:
Thank you Jill-

My user name is Whitby which is a coal town and I was so impressed by this pic. Coal Art like many other art forms does not have to be a pleasant image, but it does need to reflect our surroundings and time.

comment._content: This sign is brilliant, I hope it was removed and someone saved it...
